title: Replace app icon with user-provided image

requirements.summary: Replace the app icon/favicon with the user-uploaded image showing a black dog and orange cat with a surgical scalpel on a blue background
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image is saved as the favicon in frontend/public/
The index.html file references the new favicon correctly
The app icon displays the new image when loaded in the browser

file_operations.description: Save the user-provided image 'ChatGPT Image Feb 18, 2026, 03_23_00 PM.png' as favicon.ico in the public directory. Convert the PNG to ICO format if necessary, or use the PNG directly as modern browsers support PNG favicons.

Update the favicon link element to reference the new favicon file. Replace the current favicon reference (likely pointing to /assets/image.png) with a link to /favicon.ico or the appropriate path for the new favicon file.
